snippet: So-called asset-recovery firms often target older people who have already lost money in another type of scheme.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column notes Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has issued advisory about so-called asset-recovery firms, which target older consumers that have lost money in another type of fraud; questions and answers about avoiding telemarketing fraud provided.
lead_paragraph: So-called asset-recovery firms often target older people who have already lost money in another type of scheme.

headline.print_headline: A Fraud Targeting the Already Defrauded
headline.main: Fraudsters’ Latest Target: The Already Defrauded
